website_summaries.verdict: A great budget bag – completely waterproof and has a padded bottom to keep your gear protected.
pros: Owners have had this bag through multiple trips with no issues
Many women with smaller feet were also able to fit their helmets
cons: Can only be carried using a shoulder strap – no backpack straps

customer_reviews.title: Fits boots AND helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this two days before a trip when I realized my plan to cram my boots and helmet in my board bag was a non-starter - it's great! I was able to juuuuuust barely fit my helmet in on top of my boots if I pushed down on the helmet while slowly securing the zipper. A little bit of dead space in the toe area is perfect for a beanie and my neck gaiter, and there's a little pocket in the front for headphones, handwarmers, etc. The fabric is thick and sturdy - it feels very nice for an inexpensive bag,. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SD Annie

customer_reviews.title: Not much room
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to match the ski bag. Had to kneel on my boots to squeeze them in to get the zippers to close. Hardly room for anything else, including pretty useless pocket except for small items like socks or balaclava
customer_reviews.author: Ed S

customer_reviews.title: Carry all/ convenient perfect for overhead.
customer_reviews.text: Loved, loved, loved, loved this bag. Can you tell that I really like this bag :-) Not only did it hold my ski boots, along with gloves, neck scarves. And a few other incidentals brought it along with me skiing in Vail, and used it as a carry on with no extra fee stored in the overhead. Highly recommend this awesome bag. PS the color matched my ski boots.
customer_reviews.author: O'Shea

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bag for our 10 year old son to use for his ski boots. He is VERY hard on all items. This bag is very well made and has held up well (he's been using it for a little over 1 month and skis with his school ski club and well as family trips). We are very happy with the quality of this bag. The adjustable straps are nice for him, there is also plenty of additional room in side the bag for accessories (gloves, socks, neck gaitors, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Meg Z

customer_reviews.title: Simple value bag
customer_reviews.text: Great value bag for someone that doesn't need to bring a ton of gear. Slim design, cross body strap.
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to hold my boots, ski pants, hat, gloves and scarf. I wish it was a little bigger to hold my helmet too, but I'm able to fasten my helmet to the handles so it all works.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baird

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag! Fits my snowboarding boots with ease
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag! Fits my snowboarding boots with ease. I also use this for ice skates and roller skates. I wear a size 5.5 in skates and my boots are an 8. Seems like it would fit a larger size boot. I can fit an extra shirt, towel, goggles in the bag (smaller items). Strong material and stylish. Three holes for venting located at the bottom with a tarp like plastic on the bottom that feels a tad thin. I could see that ripping at some point after many uses or getting caught on something sharp. Yet to test that theory out though, it could be stronger than I think. Great bag for the price!
customer_reviews.author: AFaustinaKid

customer_reviews.title: Good for airline
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to carry your ski boots easy to travel on an airline
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $$.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bagbof high quality. Plenty of room for boots, goggles, gloves, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Tom R S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice size! fits my size13 boots gloves and two pairs of goggles. Front pocket is good
customer_reviews.author: Alex P

customer_reviews.title: Simple Boot Bag
customer_reviews.text: The boot bag is straight fwd and does the job. It's no frills, and that's what i was hoping for. I purchased the boot bag to store my Red Wing Work Boots. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Endor

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag if your feet are not large
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my snowboarding boots but my size 12 boots did not fit very well. The bag is nice quality besides not being large enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for kids ski equipment! I can fit my 8 year old’s boots, helmet and goggles and still have room for a pair of long johns and socks. Amazing quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Katy brunelle

customer_reviews.title: Not just for ski boots!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted! Works great for storing cowboy boots!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased two of these for my kids ski boots. They work great and help things organized in a vehicle full of ski gear. We also discovered they work quite nicely for ice skates!
customer_reviews.author: Peder Vist

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great value
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bag all week while on a ski trip to Breckenridge. It is great - sturdy, roomy enough for ski boots, helmet and spare gloves. I also like the long strap so I can carry it over my shoulder. Great value for the price"
customer_reviews.author: Home Chef

customer_reviews.title: Description not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not big enough for men's boots and a helmet. But youth size boots and a helmet could probably fit. There is room for Goggles, gloves and other small gear.
customer_reviews.author: Alden Hellmuth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Was able to get my boots and my helmet into the bag
customer_reviews.author: Brent Bovenzi

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality for the price. Men's sizes ski boots fit easily, with room for helmet in the toe area. Padding is a great bonus at this price point, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sven

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product; very well constructed. Accommodates comfortably inline skates and gear. BF loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha D.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a ski boot carrier.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is nice. It is the perfect size for my size 11 (US) boots. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: My son's father

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for great price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for a great price. Lots of room inside which holds boots, helmet, gloves and jacket. The mesh pocket on the outside is great. Only improvement would be to have a small compartment within the bag to hold chapstick, keys, money, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi K.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for my 8 & 10 year old son's to use for there boots goggles and helmets. They fit with still some room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space for all ski gear
customer_reviews.text: Using this item as a bag for kids ski equipment, everything from boots to helmet and clothing fits without a problem. I liked it so much that I bought a second one in order to have one per child.
customer_reviews.author: Krystallyn

customer_reviews.title: I bought for my son he wears 318mm ski boots ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my son he wears 318mm ski boots. It won't fit for both of his ski boots and helmet.
customer_reviews.author: ICT

product_meta.title: Element Equipment Padded Boot Bag Snowboard Ski Boot Bag
feature_bullets: FULLY PADDED-600D PVC Coated Polyester with 5mil padding is waterproof, super tough, and keeps your gear dry and protected.
Perfect grab and go size - Holds 1 pair of ski or snowboard boots and gloves, goggles, hat, etc. 15 x 15 x 9 inches.
Reinforced construction with double stitching, lined interior, fully padded, shoulder strap, carry handles.
Fits up to mens 13 size boots
100% Guarantee. We stand behind our products.
